Logic in color
Dimensions

Thinking is two-dimensional.

0 types of stuff drawn as
colors		 animal
1 judgements relate types strings
connect colors		 animal $a$
eats
plant $p$
2 inferences transform judgements beads
connect strings		 if
$a$ eats $p$
then
$a$ gets $p$

When we reason, inferences compose in two ways: in sequence and in parallel.

sequence if $R$
then $S$
then $T$
parallel if $R\odot U$
then $S\odot V$
